activities: Augeo manages recognition and incentive solutions for clients in the us and internationally. Many times these programs require that we receive sensitive information from our clients around their personnel, customers and constituents. Depending on the program this information is used to award users for desired behavior. We do not collect information such as ssn and the data collected is used to only manage the specific client programs. At no point is data shared with any third parties without approval.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and client information including HRIS data, without ssn, payroll information, address, phone, email, fax.  Data processed in an automated fashion and processed manually are covered.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
